rules_text:
Lifelink
Whenever you gain life during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target nonartifact creature you control.
Scavenge {4}{B}{G} [i]({4}{B}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)[/i]
